comIpDnsResolver.name: comIpDnsResolver
comIpDnsResolver.contactinfo: Postal: Zhone Technologies, Inc. @ Zhone Way 7001 Oakport Street Oakland, CA 94621 USA Toll-Free: +1 877-ZHONE20 (+1 877-946-6320) Tel: +1-510-777-7000 Fax: +1-510-777-7001 E-mail: support@zhone.com
comIpDnsResolver.description: DNS Resolver MIB IP Software Minneapolis, MN

dnsResolver.name: dnsResolver
dnsResolver.description: DNS Resolver objects based on RFC 1612.

zhDnsResConfigImplementIdent.name: zhDnsResConfigImplementIdent
zhDnsResConfigImplementIdent.description: The implementation identification string for the resolver software in use on the system, for example; `RES-2.1'. The maximum length for this name is 32 characters.

zhDnsResConfigTable.name: zhDnsResConfigTable
zhDnsResConfigTable.description: Table of nameservers information used by the resolver to send a query. Rows are created and destroyed whenever a routing domain is created or destroyed. Rows cannot be created or destroyed via SNMP.

zhDnsResConfigEntry.name: zhDnsResConfigEntry
zhDnsResConfigEntry.description: A single routing domain in a single subnet.

zhDnsResConfigQueryOrder.name: zhDnsResConfigQueryOrder
zhDnsResConfigQueryOrder.description: Kind of resolver query for this routing domain: hostsFirst(1) searches the local hosts table first, then the list of nameservers dnsFirst(2) searches the list of nameservers first, then the local hosts table dnsOnly(3) searches only the list of nameservers

zhDnsResConfigDomainName.name: zhDnsResConfigDomainName
zhDnsResConfigDomainName.description: Domain name to use for searches in this routing domain. The maximum length for this name is 255 characters.

zhDnsResConfigFirstNameServer.name: zhDnsResConfigFirstNameServer
zhDnsResConfigFirstNameServer.description: The IP address of the first/primary name server for this routing domain.

zhDnsResConfigSecondNameServer.name: zhDnsResConfigSecondNameServer
zhDnsResConfigSecondNameServer.description: The IP address of the secondary name server for this routing domain. This nameserver is queried if the first nameserver cannot resolve the query. If a secondary name server has not been defined, this field is set to 0.0.0.0

zhDnsResConfigThirdNameServer.name: zhDnsResConfigThirdNameServer
zhDnsResConfigThirdNameServer.description: The IP address of the third name server for this routing domain. This nameserver is queried if the first nameserver and the secondary nameserver cannot resolve the query. If a third name server has not been defined, this field is set to 0.0.0.0

zhDnsResHostsTable.name: zhDnsResHostsTable
zhDnsResHostsTable.description: This is the local hosts table (ie. /etc/hosts) for each routing domain.

zhDnsResHostsEntry.name: zhDnsResHostsEntry
zhDnsResHostsEntry.description: A particular host entry per routing domain. Rows are created and destroyed whenever a hostname within a routing domain is created and destroyed, ie. rows are added by setting zhDnsResHostsRowStatus to createAndGo. Rows are removed by setting zhDnsResHostsRowStatus to destroy. The minimum columns required to create new entry are zhDnsResHostsIpAddress and zhDnsResHostsName.

zhDnsResHostsIpAddress.name: zhDnsResHostsIpAddress
zhDnsResHostsIpAddress.description: The IP address of this entry. 127.1 (127.0.0.1) is a valid ip address.

zhDnsResHostsName.name: zhDnsResHostsName
zhDnsResHostsName.description: Hostname for this entry. The hostname can be either fully-qualified or hostname only. The maximum length for this name is 255 characters.

zhDnsResHostsAlias1.name: zhDnsResHostsAlias1
zhDnsResHostsAlias1.description: Hostname alias for this entry. The hostname can be either fully-qualified or hostname only. The maximum length for this name is 255 characters.

zhDnsResHostsAlias2.name: zhDnsResHostsAlias2
zhDnsResHostsAlias2.description: Another hostname alias for this entry. The hostname can be either fully-qualified or hostname only. The maximum length for this name is 255 characters.

zhDnsResHostsAlias3.name: zhDnsResHostsAlias3
zhDnsResHostsAlias3.description: Another hostname alias for this entry. The hostname can be either fully-qualified or hostname only. The maximum length for this name is 255 characters.

zhDnsResHostsAlias4.name: zhDnsResHostsAlias4
zhDnsResHostsAlias4.description: Another hostname alias for this entry. The hostname can be either fully-qualified or hostname only. The maximum length for this name is 255 characters.

zhDnsResHostsRowStatus.name: zhDnsResHostsRowStatus
zhDnsResHostsRowStatus.reference: See ZHONE-TC-MIB for definition of ZhoneRowStatus.
zhDnsResHostsRowStatus.description: The row status variable, used according to row installation and removal conventions.
